snippet: The tiny abrasives, used in exfoliators and other care products, have the same effect as grinding up plastic water bottles and dumping them into the ocean, environmentalists say.
lead_paragraph: The tiny abrasives, used in exfoliators and other care products, have the same effect as grinding up plastic water bottles and dumping them into the ocean, environmentalists say.

headline.print_headline: California Becomes Latest State to Ban Plastic Microbeads
headline.main: California Becomes Latest State to Ban Plastic Microbeads
